verses.name: 2 Kings 7:13
verses.text: And one of his servants answered and said, Let some take, I pray thee, five of the horses that remain, which are left in the city, (behold, they are as all the multitude of Israel that are left in it: behold, I say, they are even as all the multitude of the Israelites that are consumed:) and let us send and see.

verses.name: 2 Kings 7:14
verses.text: They took therefore two chariot horses; and the king sent after the host of the Syrians, saying, Go and see.
